mapper.insert: insert into customer_info ( id,type,season2,season3,season4, name,sex,phone_staff_id,receiver_staff_id, business_phone,phone,visit_date, area,update_date, phone2,relation_id,qq,msn, site,id_card,product,transaction_amount, recent_import_date ) values ( rand_string(16), #{p0}, #{p1}, #{p2}, #{p3}, #{p4}, '', (select a.id from employee_info a where a.name=#{p5} limit 1), (select a.id from employee_info a where a.name=#{p6} limit 1), #{p8}, #{p9}, case when #{p10} = '' then null else DATE_FORMAT(#{p10},'%Y-%m-%d') end, #{p11}, case when #{p12} = '' then null else DATE_FORMAT(#{p12},'%Y-%m-%d') end, #{p13}, #{p14}, #{p15}, #{p16}, #{p17},#{p18},#{p19}, case when #{p20} = '' then null else #{p20} end, now() ) on duplicate key update recent_import_date = now(), type = #{p0}, update_date = (case when #{p12} = '' then null else DATE_FORMAT(#{p12},'%Y-%m-%d') end), phone_staff_id = (select a.id from employee_info a where a.name=#{p5} limit 1)
